review: I really cannot stress how absolutely ingenious this is and how simple it is to set up and use.Cool tip:  Your streaming capabilities are nearly endless with this cool trick.  Say you have a movie stored on your computer that you want to watch, but you can only stream chrome tabs.  If you just open a new chrome window and click+drag the movie/icon into the window, you can play it through chrome (and therefore watch it on chromecast).  I use this literally every single day and have hooked several family members and friends on to it.
author: Dylan H.
